definitions.definition: A slick and light ship for making pleasure trips or racing on water, having sails but often motor-powered. At times used as a residence offshore on a dock.
examples: Would you like to go sailing on my uncle’s yacht ?
You are a true yachtsman! Are you a member of the local yacht club?

definitions.definition: Any vessel used for private, noncommercial purposes.

main_definition: ( nautical ) A slick and light ship for making pleasure trips or racing on water, having sails but often motor-powered. At times used as a residence offshore on a dock.
secondary_definitions: Any vessel used for private, noncommercial purposes.
